TABLE.NAME: report_customsql_queries
TABLE.COMMENT: Custom SQL queries that can be run as ad-hoc reports.

FIELD.NAME: displayname
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the report as displayed in the UI

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A human-readable description of the query.

FIELD.NAME: querysql
FIELD.COMMENT: The SQL to run to generate this report.

FIELD.NAME: queryparams
FIELD.COMMENT: The SQL parameters to generate this report.

FIELD.NAME: querylimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Limit the number of results returned.

FIELD.NAME: capability
FIELD.COMMENT: The capability that a user needs to have to run this report.

FIELD.NAME: lastrun
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when this report was last run.

FIELD.NAME: lastexecutiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time this report took to run last time it was executed, in milliseconds.

FIELD.NAME: singlerow
FIELD.COMMENT: Only meaningful to set this scheduled reports. Means the report can only return one row of data, and the report builds up a row at a time.

FIELD.NAME: at
FIELD.COMMENT: The time for the daily report

FIELD.NAME: emailto
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma separated list of usernames

FIELD.NAME: emailwhat
FIELD.COMMENT: A list of email options in a select menu

FIELD.NAME: categoryid
FIELD.COMMENT: The category ID from report_customsql_categories table.
